tool_description: Analyzes synthesized speech audio quality by measuring naturalness, intelligibility, pronunciation accuracy, and prosodic appropriateness against reference metrics.
error_messages: Invalid audio format: Audio data format is not supported for analysis.
Text-audio mismatch: Audio duration does not match expected text length.
Invalid quality metrics: Use supported metrics (naturalness, intelligibility, prosody, pronunciation).
Analysis failed: Unable to complete quality analysis.
usage: Provide audio_data and reference_text. Optionally specify quality_metrics to focus analysis. Returns comprehensive quality scores and recommendations.

metric_scores.description: Individual scores for each analyzed metric
